name: adomis
description: Static web site for the Astronomical Society of Omis.

scripts.autoprefixer: postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' public/style.css | postcss -c postcss.config.js -o public/style.css
scripts.build:icons: postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' styles/icons.css | postcss -c postcss.config.js -o public/icons.css
scripts.build:css: npm run sass && npm run autoprefixer && npm run build:icons
scripts.build:js: npm run lint && rollup -c && rollup -c lazy.config.js
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:critical

author: Bruna Brakus, Miro Dojkic
